description:
Compute service is down on the compute node and when checked the log we found the below

sudo tail -n1 /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log*==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log <== 

2012-03-29 04:39:10,267 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=31963) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:208 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.1 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.10 <== 
2012-03-19 06:24:18,212 DEBUG nova [-] Greenthread (id:78347400) for consumers is alive from (pid=7434) check_consumers /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py:440 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.11 <== 
2012-03-18 06:24:27,473 DEBUG nova [-] Greenthread (id:78347400) for consumers is alive from (pid=7434) check_consumers /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py:440 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.12 <== 
2012-03-17 06:24:35,512 INFO nova.compute.manager [-] Updating host status 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.13 <== 
2012-03-16 06:24:50,128 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] switching context after querying domain_id 37 from (pid=7434) list_instances_detail /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:268 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.14 <== 
2012-03-15 06:24:57,743 INFO nova.compute.manager [-] Updating host status 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.2 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.3 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.4 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.5 <== 
2012-03-23 18:23:37,368 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=30065) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:203 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.6 <== 
2012-03-22 17:39:12,565 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=3606) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:203 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.7 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.8 <== 
2012-03-20 18:33:59,762 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=4279) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:203 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.9 <== 
2012-03-20 06:25:04,384 DEBUG nova [-] Greenthread (id:78347400) for consumers is alive from (pid=7434) check_consumers /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py:440
title: Compute service crashing because 'Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system'

comments.content:
Compute service is down on the compute node and when checked the log we found the below

sudo tail -n1 /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log*==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log <== 

2012-03-29 04:39:10,267 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=31963) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:208 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.1 <== 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.10 <== 
2012-03-19 06:24:18,212 DEBUG nova [-] Greenthread (id:78347400) for consumers is alive from (pid=7434) check_consumers /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py:440 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.11 <== 
2012-03-18 06:24:27,473 DEBUG nova [-] Greenthread (id:78347400) for consumers is alive from (pid=7434) check_consumers /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py:440 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.12 <== 
2012-03-17 06:24:35,512 INFO nova.compute.manager [-] Updating host status 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.13 <== 
2012-03-16 06:24:50,128 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] switching context after querying domain_id 37 from (pid=7434) list_instances_detail /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:268 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.14 <==

2012-03-23 18:23:37,368 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=30065) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:203 

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.6 <== 
2012-03-22 17:39:12,565 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt_conn [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system from (pid=3606) _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py:203

==> /var/log/nova/nova-compute.log.9 <==

comments.content: your libvirtd process may hungs  ,try to restart libvirt-bin  ,then  start nova-compute.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~heut2008

comments.content: Satya, did Ya Guang's comments help?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt

comments.content: Also is it something you can easily reproduce ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
